channel.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Next on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Next on SoftLayer API

item.title: getExcel
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Next::getExcel Overview Return an account’s next invoice in a Microsoft excel format. Parameters Name Type Description documentCreateDate dateTime Retrieves Excel on file created after this date. (optional) Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_NextInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values binary data

item.title: getPdf
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Next::getPdf Overview Return an account’s next invoice in PDF format. Parameters Name Type Description documentCreateDate dateTime Retrieves PDF on file created after this date. (optional) Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_NextInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values binary data

item.title: getPdfDetailed
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Next::getPdfDetailed Overview Return an account’s next invoice detailed portion in PDF format. Parameters Name Type Description documentCreateDate dateTime Retrieves PDF Details on file created after this date. (optional) Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_NextInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values binary data
